chat.empty.title: No chats
chat.empty.subtitle: There are no chats to display.
chat.header.description: Select a friend from the autocomplete, then you can optionally add a title to your message in the top input field and write your message in the text field below that input.
createCollection.addCards.description: Enter your question and answer, then click the Add Card button. Your card will then be added to the collection and the input will be updated so you can keep adding as many cards as you like.
createCollection.addCards.title: Add cards
createCollection.addCards.question: Question
createCollection.header.title: Create new collection
createCollection.header.description: Enter a name for your collection, choose the category that best matches the content of the cards you want to add, then start adding cards below! By clicking the Submit collection button, you will save your collection and all the cards added to it. Clicking the Cancel button will return you to the previous page and any cards that have been added to the collection will not be saved.
flashcards.empty.title: No collections
flashcards.empty.subtitle: There are no card collections to display. Sorry! Try creating a new collection first.
flashcards.noMatches.title: No matches
flashcards.noMatches.subtitle: We can't find a card collection that matches this description.
flashcards.header.title: Flashcard collection
flashcards.preferences.title: Settings
mainHelpPanel.content.p1: Welcome! This is where the contents of the help panel will be placed in the future. For now, this text is just holding its place to show translation effects.
mainHelpPanel.content.p2: Hi, my name is –Æ–ª—è! I'm the best Russian instructor you'll ever find, I promise. If you can't tell, I'm also very humble and modest ü§™.
scheduler.header.description: Please select the date and time you would like to have a class with me. I look forward to meeting you soon!
stats.header.description: All statistics for the student will be displayed here. Each category will have its own container, such as cards, and each container can have multiple charts or just one chart. For example, the Flashcards container consists of 3 charts: Study mode, Test mode - Easy and Test mode - Difficult.
stats.flashcards.header.description: The 3 charts below show how many cards <student> answered correctly in the learning mode and how many questions were answered correctly in both testing modes (easy and difficult). These data points are reflected in real time using a push model on the server which allows server updates to be pushed directly to the website UI so there is no need to update!
stats.flashcards.studyMode.header.descri: These are data points from card sessions in Study mode.
videos.header.description: Please feel free to watch these videos I made and in fact, I encourage you to do so! They are very helpful and can help you learn and grow between our classes or if you are learning on your own. Let's do this!
videos.fakeDescription: This is a fake description that is being used as a placeholder...
create-collection-description: Enter a name for your collection, choose the category that best matches the content of the cards you want to add, then start adding cards below! Clicking the Submit Collection button will save your collection and any cards that have been added to it. Clicking the Cancel button will return you to the previous page and any cards that have been added to the collection will not be saved.
